alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 1:36PM EDT until July 09 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Virginia, including the following counties and independent cities, City of Chesapeake, City of Portsmouth, City of Suffolk, Isle of Wight, Southampton and Surry. * WHEN...Until 445 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Smithfield, Windsor, Downtown Suffolk, Holland, Churchland, Norfolk, Chesapeake, Portsmouth, Suffolk, Isle Of Wight, Ivor, Kings Fork, Driver, Zuni, Crittenden, Rescue, Carrsville, Bowers Hill, Western Branch and Cradock. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: City of Chesapeake; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry
